Posts.Content: Aug 7, 2013 11:12AM tonyxxxl wrote: Wife and I just got back from the Cancer Institute of NJ.  We found out that if they it its your choice take the Lumpectomy.  It has exactly the same prognosis.  Go to a Center connected to a University if you can.  They are so much more up on the latest development.  We had two oppinions and first Doc wanted to take out all the Nodes.  Then Doc at the Univeristy said they do not do that anymore unless absolutely neccessary.
Posts.Title: How did you decide on lumpectomy or mastectomy/ livingwithit IrishDancingMom
